name: Not Frogger
description:
You're a truck driver who really hates frogs. You get to run them over. There's a lot of frogs. Created for our Intro to Game Design class.

Controls:

  • WASD for truck driving.
  • Space for handbrake.
  • Shift to jump.
  • R to reset level.

Credits:

  • William Quinlain - texturing
  • James Rankin - music and programming
  • Andrew Rogers (that's me) - design and programming
  • Chloe Tibets - art and modelling
If you're a fan of cheat codes, press the equals key and the minus key at the same time and type in one of the following codes: JAMESFROG, CHLOEFROG, ANDREWFROG, WILLFROG, JAMESYELL, WILLYELL, ANDREWYELL, ROBLOXFROG.
